archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Fleet Management
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Database details of vehicles in the Counters, Logistics & Supply fleet. This includes cash in transit vehicles and others.
It contains information such as model, registration number etc. Migrated to MS Dynamics from Access in 2015
Currently vehicles are managed by RMG workshop. As part of separation, a third party will take over managing them, in which case this database may no longer be needed.
